pros: Comes in red-black, blue, citron-metallic, grey, navy and orange (Zappos)
cons: Gives some children blisters when worn without socks

customer_reviews.title: Great... but may cause blisters.
customer_reviews.text: I had this set on my daughter for a long trip across the country (car - plane - car) and half way through she started complaining about her feet. If you use these, be sure to not keep them on as long as you would other sandals. They have seams and cloth pieces on the inside. They will cause blisters if you have a busy day. They’re great for short term usage as a trip to the pool or an afternoon at the park. If you want to wear them longer, make sure your kid wears socks in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Eisenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more pleased with these shoes. I have purchased in three sizes so far to keep my daughter stocked as she grows. I call these her “daycare” shoes. They’re perfect for her chubby little feet. She wears them with socks. Best thing is that no pea gravel gets in her shoes and they’re so lightweight and breathable! And they stay on her feet! I toss them in the washing machine every weekend and they come out looking brand new! Only wish they made an all white color.
customer_reviews.author: RDL

customer_reviews.title: Pinched my little guy's feet.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was really cute, and it was the right length, but it irritated my son's feet. I took the advice from other reviewers and had him wear them around the house with socks to try to break them in, but the first day he had a tiny blister on the top of his foot near where the foot bends. The second time, he wore them in the stroller and carrier with socks and they rubbed the back of his feet behind the ankle red. I think his feet are a little too chubby for these shoes to fit comfortably. He is 14 months and wears size 4. Had to return them unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Finest018

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but size up!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I would say go for the higher size if you are in between. Both of my boys 2 and 4 are in their regular size, but they are fairly snug. With the straps, you can tighten them if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: So far I love them! I always have my kids wear shoes like this with socks for the first week or two. Once broken in we do suck less! I Do this with crocs as well. So far they're cute and my kids love them seem to have better support than crac seem to have better support them crocs, and will definitely support better when wet! Traction on the bottom is also much better! However I'm wondering if they come in bigger sizes anywhere? My 8 year old wants a pair!
customer_reviews.author: vanillabrice

customer_reviews.title: He says that they are comfortable. But he wore them one day and they ...
customer_reviews.text: He says that they are comfortable. But he wore them one day and they look like this! I would not buy again. If your kid is active and hard on shoes don't buy these. I'm giving them 2 stars for comfort and the idea is good.
customer_reviews.author: amy winfield

customer_reviews.title: Gave my son horrible blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Gave my son horrible blisters... I was starting to think I bought a size too small, but I know that's not the case. He always complained about them being too tight to put on. I was hoping they sold these in wides, but they don't. I really like the concept of these shoes.. They actually work great for my 2 year old daughter. But these are a huge disappointment... he has huge blisters/open wounds on both feet, both sides. :(
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Horrible blisters!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for my daughter to try these shoes for summer. We have always purchased stride rite shoes and have never had a problem. After an hour or so of wearing these inside the house, my daughter had terrible blisters. She couldn't wear any shoes at all for 3 days. They were packaged back up and returned the next day! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Brickey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Mud
customer_reviews.text: When you live in central Illinois and it does nothing but rain, you make puddle stomping a past time. These. Shoes. Are. Fantastic! Mud, water, sand you name it. Then we hose them off and let them dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Junge

customer_reviews.title: She loves the colors of these shoes and they are easy to get off and on her feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter. She wears the same size in these shoes as her tennis shoes. She loves that she can wear these any where. If she is getting in the water she leaves them on or if she is just playing outside she loves to wear them. I was worried about blisters but she has not had any blisters from wearing these shoes. We have also had an issue with stinky feet and rubber shoes, this has not been a problem at all. She loves the colors of these shoes and they are easy to get off and on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Creasey

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes and we get so many compliments!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing my daughter loves them and she gets so many compliments I saw on reviews the other people who got them were having problems with them causing blisters on the kids feet but we have not had any problems with the shoes at all! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: LRR

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for rambunctious kids, but fit okay
customer_reviews.text: Update: 3 to 5 stars. These shoes are work horses. They broke in and held up the entire summer. They are dirty now, but show hardly any wear - and they are rough boys. Buying again next summer. Hands down worth the price. Sandals and tennis shoes are terrible kid summer shoes for many reasons. These are a perfect compromise. Original review: These fit okay. My kids are each a half size below, but the fit is fine. They look nice. Both kids say they hurt, though. I'm hoping that gets better - breaking in period. I suspect the ratings are mostly hype. I hope they hold up. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable but take more time to put on than sandals
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is thrilled with these and chose these over the bump toe fisherman style sandal I usually purchase for summer. They fit well and can get wet plus they protect her precious toes while she plays hard! I am also grateful these are NOT pink - she is SO over pink and purple as an 8 year old and it's nice to have other options. My *slight* complaint is that these take more time to put on than the fisherman style sandals and so she has reverted to occasionally wearing her trashed sandals from last summer because they are, "easier to put on."
customer_reviews.author: Thrilled Mama

customer_reviews.title: BLISTERS ON TINY FEET
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited about these shoes, he was waiting 3 days till we got them and on his first day he got blisters, He never got blisters for his 5 years. The worst part is that he likes them so it's just horrible predicament for me.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa G. Horback

customer_reviews.title: Beware of blisters as multiple other reviewers have stated!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these shoes, however they left horrible, huge blisters on the inside of each of my little guy's feet, after just 30 minutes of wear. Poor kiddo was in pain the rest of our vacation due to these shoes. Packaged up and returned as soon as we got back home. Don't waste your money on these!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for camp!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these all summer at camp without any issues. She did not wear socks and never got blisters from them. Once in a while a rock or wood chip came in through the holes, but it wasn’t a big deal. They do start to stink after a week or so of wearing, but they are very easy to clean, threw them in the wash every weekend and let them dry in the sun or in front of an a/c vent. I already bought her a pair in a size up for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! My son loves them and I do too!
customer_reviews.text: My son hates regular sneakers but has foot pain when he wear Crocs, so we were so glad to find these. They provide decent foot support and my son's feet don't cramp when he wears these. We live in South Florida so we do a lot of Splash Pads and Amusement Parks and these work well for those types of scenarios so I don't have to bring water shoes and sneakers and bug him to switch them out. This is the second pair we are buying because he just grew out of his first. Definitely recommend these shoes for all parents! They make life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: MechInspector

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on!
customer_reviews.text: These are clearly handy being that they’re good for water or dry play and they’re affordable. But my husband and I could not get these on our toddler. She has a wide foot, but they also don’t open up easy. Many toddler shoes splay open nicely so their little foot can be put in. These do not. They hold the exact shape of the shoe and don’t budge. Combine that with the grippy material and there was no way we were getting her foot in there without a fight. Even with socks on. We ended up spending more on Keens and were happy we did. MUCH practical for common use.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!  Cute, comfy, all purpose, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I can't give info on the fit, as my 2 year old son (yes he has big feet) can't quite answer that. But I know this, this is the 4th pair of these I have purchased (I have 2 kids) and I LOVE them!! They are comfortable, all purpose, easy to clean (washing machine!!) and hold up really well. If Stride Rite is listening, make these in either ALL BLACK or ALL WHITE and you would sell a million of them for kids' uniform shoes. (I'd buy at least 2 pair myself...)
customer_reviews.author: FrugalSuperMommy

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill for summer camp!
customer_reviews.text: I let me 5yo son pick these out, hoping to drum up some excitement to wear them (new shoes can be a struggle). He can put them on by himself and they fit the requirements of his summer camp (close-toed water shoes). I love that the sole is "grippy" and that so far they don't stink. They haven't scuffed and seem very durable so far. Only slight downside is that he got 2 small blisters on the inside of his feet with the first few wears, but that's to be expected with any new shoes, especially ones you wear without sock. They cleared up in no time and no problems since. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa A.

customer_reviews.title: summer shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is 3 . I was looking for summer sandals but needed something that also gives toe protection, weather-proof, and something that can pass for shoes for her camp. This is the one shoe for everything: play, water shoes, camp shoes, etc etc. I also love how I can just hose these down when they get dirty. Plus I love how the color hides dirt and scruffs. It's not the "girlie" kind of shoes but I find these to be super practical and no frills.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jo

customer_reviews.title: left blisters
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these shoes! However, after just one full day of wear, they left blisters on the inside edge of the arches on my sons feet. It defeats the purpose, but I won't let him wear them without socks now. He loves the shoes and wants to wear them, but they are not serving the purpose for which they were bought.....for the beach, for the pool, for a cooler shoe to wear outside in the summer. I'm giving 3 stars because they are a durable, well made shoe. Maybe it's my sons feet.....he's almost 3 but still has those "chunky" baby feet.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Chatlos

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE, blisters guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Anyone buying this shoe does so in order for their child to use it without socks and play in water. These shoes are absolutely atrocious, horrendous in the way they will create blisters on your child's feet if they are used without socks. This will happen in a manner of a few hours of play time and the only way for them to wear it again will be with socks which defeats the whole purpose. Do not buy...you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: ELISEO PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Color peels off after 1 wear, gives blisters
customer_reviews.text: Silver color is not rubber. It started wearing off after one wear. Also, I bought these shoes for water days at camp, and my daughter cannot wear these without socks or she gets blisters. Defeats the purpose of why I bought them in the first place. Should’ve listened to the other reviews and stuck with plae shoes. I’ll be buying those again next summer.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Fabric does not dry quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My son is outside all summer playing in puddles, the creek, at the splash pad, etc. We had a similar pair of stride rite sandals from Target that didn't have the fabric and we loved them. We could rinse them off and be ready to go again. When he grew out of those I went back for another pair and they didnt have them since it is the end of the season. So I found these. They got his wide/fat feet well and are easy to get on and off. My biggest issue is the fabric does not dry quickly at all. If they didn't have the fabric, they would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MarieC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son wore this twice to the splash pad - both times he ended up with blisters on his feet. These are the correct size for his feet and none of his other shoes have ever caused him blisters. I feel so bad for the poor little guy. I had read the reviews prior to purchasing and thought maybe the other people that had gotten blisters didn't have the right fit. I now know that its the way the shoe is made. So sad to see such poor quality from a brand like Stride Rite!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Craft

customer_reviews.title: Shoes left deep creases on tops of feet
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the shoes, and my little guy seemed to like wearing them, but they left very deep creases on the tops of his feet, and one of them even scabbed. I tried to make sure the tongue wasn’t bunched, but this happened every time (they were his only shoes on vacation, so we were stuck with them at the time). They were somewhat on the snug side, but I don’t think he’s in the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahshmara

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, but did not work out for my son.
customer_reviews.text: Good concept, especially since my son doesn't like to be barefoot at the water parks/beach, but when he did wear it, he found it very uncomfortable. We were at a water park when he wore these for the first time and he did not want to wear them again the following day. He said they hurt his feet and were red when he removed them. They did fit as expected, but just were not comfortable on him. It's too bad, because my younger son had these last year and he had no trouble with them.
customer_reviews.author: kmagz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3rd old
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for my 3rd old. We live in the country and there's mud, sand, and chicken poop! They wash easy and dry fast. They stay on through all the mud glorping, puddle jumping, and climbing. He calls them his water shoes and he loves them. I just bought a pair for his sister (15 months). Also, the price can't be beat. If they're too expensive at the moment, come back in a week. The price seems to change quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on toddlers! Easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 2 year old toddler. He hates sitting still for me to lace up tennis shoes. He also has been know to love to splash in the water after it rains. I like the convenience of the Velcro strap. It’s also nice not having to put socks on him since they are for dry and wet situations. They fit him great, I was hesitant over the bad reviews but they do great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Ciera

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable may cause blisters
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these shoes would be comfortable for my son because I really liked the style and the color, but was disappointed. The first day he wore them he ended up with blisters and complainting his feet hurt. He only wore them for an hour and that was enough for him. I even went a size up just incase, but it still didn't help. Incase you buy them keep eye on your little ones so that they don't end up with bad blisters. (Ordered the grey pair)
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these for less than an hour and got a bad blister. Otherwise, they are super cute and fit as expected. If you intend to wear them with socks, they would be good shoes. They didn't work out for us as water shoes, though, which is why I had bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my toddler to wear all day when he plays outside. He can go from the beach, to the water table, to the mud/dirt and to the park without having to change shoes. They're comfortable, durable and super easy to clean. These shoes are a mama's dream!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Mom fix
customer_reviews.text: Great year round shoes for our region-- yes, we even wear them in the winter with socks. If you have a curious little puddle jumper, hose playing, water magnet they are the best. My 5 year old has been wearing these since 2 with gaps due to large feet and department stores not carrying larger sizes. Thanks to Amazon, I am finding them in larger sizes!!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: sturdy shoe perfect for the summer
customer_reviews.text: These are a cute, sturdy shoe perfect for the summer. I got them a little big so he could grow into them as I don't really need them until August when he starts his new school. They don't allow children to wear open toe sandals, so these are perfect for kids whose feet you want to breathe, yet are sturdy enough to protect their little feet. My son said they were comfortable. And they're machine washable....perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brookeybaby73

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for summer, stitching could be better
customer_reviews.text: These are great for summer and playing with water. My son loves wearing them and he’s very picky about shoes. He has not gotten any blisters wearing them but he’s obsessed with wearing socks so I’m not sure if that’s been helping with that. I like how easily they can be cleaned and they dry quite quickly. I would’ve given it 5 stars but the stitching on one of the lace openings became undone just a couple of weeks after we got the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for summer play!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for all day at camp - no concerns about getting wet while playing outside. They're perfect for indoor/outdoor play. My daughter loves the rainbow colors. Worked well at the splash pad. Feet can get a little sweaty if wearing them all day in the heat so I wouldn't suggest using them at an amusement park, Disney, etc. in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love the different color and pattern options. These are great for little kids and toddlers that love the play outside, especially if they have sweaty feet. Socks are optional with this shoe, easy Velcro and material stretches a little to fit feet. Easy to clean. Recommended for summer/late spring/early fall. Nice Tred as well and no complaints from my child, as to her feet hurting. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: STRIDE RITE MADE 2 PLAY PHIBIAN SNEAKER SANDAL WATER SHOE
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter, she does love them. I didn't read they are water shoes and the thing is I wanted plastic shoes for her because she can wear them as tennis shoes that will last a long time. With the holes on them her feet will be less sweaty and they will be easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Best kids summer shoe, ever!
customer_reviews.text: We love the Phibians shoes! All of my kids live in them during the summer... the quality is perfect, and they hold up well, despite the many adventures my children undertake over summer vacation! We love all the different colors, and versatility of the shoes to be worn to daycare or on various family trips! This will continue to be a staple item in the summer survival kits!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Cool colors, and is exactly as one would expect
customer_reviews.text: They are what they say they are. A nice water-shoe, but also great for general wearing. They are easy to slip on, so we often default to them in outings. Only down side is the Velcro. It holds okay, but I often find it unclasped. Not even sure it needs a clasp, since it is elastic around the foot. I would say get rid of the clasp all together or use a different fastening method. But that is a small detail. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best shoes for active toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my very active 19 month old. He loves to play outside and he is not afraid to get wet or dirty. These shoes are the BEST. Socks are not required because they are made kind of like crocs, with holes and the same kind of material. So they just slip right on and he's off! Plus it doesn't matter if they get wet, or mucky from being outside, as they wipe clean easily and can even be tossed in the washing machine! These shoes are a dream and he has received many compliments on his "cool shoes" (we got the ninja turtle design). I cannot say enough good things about these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fuss-free for Summer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son a pair of these for summer this year, and they're awesome! They're durable, easy to put on, washable and he says that they're comfortable. I trust the Stride Rite brand because they last! I love that they are so easy to take care of- just hose em' off or toss in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Digby

customer_reviews.title: Runs a smidge big
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is in a size 7.5 right now in new balance tennis shoes (his toes are at the edge of the 7s, but the 8s are too big). These fit perfectly still with some room in the toes. Not good for wearing in the sand because the sand gets trapped, but great for splash pads and playing with the water table on the back patio.
customer_reviews.author: Booknerd28Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Lake/beach shoe
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my son for the beach and they are amazing. He wears them about twice a week and he can walk anywhere with them. They are a little wide but we needed that for his little feet. They are tight to get on but once they are on they are fantastic especially when he goes exploring in the woods at the lake!
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Really cool idea for a kids shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really cool idea for a kids shoe. My husband was wanting a pair for himself. Unfortunately these run about one size large. I ordered a size 1 for my son and they were at least a size 2. My son decided he didn't want me to order these again so I just returned them since I didn't want t battle with getting him to wear them. I ended up going with Keen sandals since I know they are a good fit and durable.. I would say size down for sure.
customer_reviews.author: lomo7678

customer_reviews.title: Wanted these to work
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, and I thought they would be great for summer hikes. My daughter and son both got a pair, wore them once and ended up with blisters in multiple places. Tried to add mole skin, but then they complained about the top of the shoes being too tight. We ended up donating them. I'd suggest a different shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cherbear

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Loves these for my 3.5yr old. He does have slightly narrow feet so they are perfect on him. I would imagine a child with thicker/wider feet wouldn't be able to comfortably wear these though. I feel like stride rite would benefit from making these in a Wide size also.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these shoes! These are the fourth pair each of my sons have had. We love them so much. Super comfortable. Easy to clean. Easy to dry. Awesome colors. We get compliments everywhere we go. Buy them! And my sons have had ZERO blisters. I wish they had these in adult sizes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loriann828

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great water shoes. They fit good, and they lasted or two seasons. The Velcro eventually stopped holding. Nic colors, they held up really well for my active kids. The kids said they were comfortable, they had nice tread and Didn’t have trouble walking on the rocks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Surprize by Stride Rite version of this shoe from Target but found that it just didn’t fit right. Splurged and bought these shoes and couldn’t be happier. Love the mesh at the heel which helps the foot stay put and decreases rubbing. The bottoms of the shoe also have great anti-slip whereas the Target version does not. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell J. Grasser

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these adorable, they are functional in every way! The soles grip well on slippery surfaces, they are well ventilated, fit snuggly, and easy (for the most part) to get on and off! These shoes were perfect for my toddler at the beach and pool. She played in the sand, ocean, and mud and never complained about anything getting in her shoes. Best of all, I can spray them off with the hose or in a utility sink and they are good to go! I wish I had bought these earlier in the summer so that she would have had them at the pop up fountains. Stride Rite has made the perfect toddler shoe!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenS13

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We bought ours a size up based on the recommendation of some mom friends, the strap and mesh around he ankle fits so well that they still stay on. Now not only do they fit but she has a whole shoe size up to grow into them. They slip on great and stay put. They drain well and aren't slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Beware of blisters
customer_reviews.text: At first these shoes were great. We wanted a pair our daughter could wear to school 3 1/2 days a week. Well even though the sizing is accurate something with the shoe isn’t made well because they caused her to develop nasty blisters on the insides of both feet above the arch. Really disappointed in the stride rite brand and planning to return for something that won’t make her feet bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes! She has been playing in the creek, jumping in mud puddles, and wearing them to daycare! They still look brand new, and I don't have to worry about her ruining her good shoes. These wash off with a quick spray of the hose. She hasn't had any blisters or redness from them.
customer_reviews.author: cld

customer_reviews.title: Meh - somewhat satisfied with
customer_reviews.text: A little small for our 2.5 son on the heel. We ordered the right shoe size but it just fits a little smaller than expected. I also tried to wash these to get some of the sweaty kids' shoe smell out by putting it in the washer - that didn't really work. They still have a little bit of funk and aroma... Oh well, overall somewhat satisfied with but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TheNESbro

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. I bought a pair last year and had to buy them again for this summer. I love how easy they clean and that they let his feet breathe in the summer. He prefers to wear them with socks, but the shoes work well that way too. Hes got a very skinny but long foot. But these shoes fit well. He loves that he doesnt have to worry about where he wears them because they are so easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan H.

customer_reviews.title: BLISTERS, HARD TO GET FOOT IN!
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old can't get foot in, and she can put all her other shoes on. They are too narrow and tight to squeeze into foot hole even with strap open and this is a half size bigger than normal. The shoe itself isn't too small. She wore them dry, and she already has BLISTERS! Now she hates them, and now I can't return thrn because I was efficient and ordered them in April for summer. Waste of $20. The $5 babies r us water shoes were way better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Stride Rite Phibians for the last 2 summers for my kids. They make it through the whole season of parks, pools, and sand. The holes allow airflow and water drainage but are small enough that wood chips at the park don't usually get in. Easy to put on and take off, and machine washable. They look brand new even at the end of the summer. Will definitely order new sizes next year!
customer_reviews.author: JTRMZ07

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 20 month old. They fit as expected and were easily to get on. They were a lot more sturdy than I expected compared to previous shoes I’ve bought for our oldest son. We used them in an indoor pool/water park and they worked great. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy Clean. Great for Summer!
customer_reviews.text: Ran true to size. I love that they’re easy to wash! My son is a very active child and he always finds a way to get dirty. It’s been a struggle finding shoes that would be easy to keep clean and dry quickly. These are great for water play like sprinklers in the backyard or playing in puddles. I’m not worried about ruining his shoes because they’re pretty durable and a quick run under a hose cleans them up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lana GF

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my daughter's feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter does not have wide feet but these where to tight on her feet and was painful for her to walk. She only got to wear them for about 15 minutes and couldn't take the pain anymore. Don't buy these.. I love the idea but not if they are hurting our children.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for active kids in summer
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these shoes and my sons wear them ALL summer; to the beach, pool, playground, amusement parks. We have not had any issues such as rubbing of heels. I make them wear socks until it's time to get in or near water and then they take them off. So convenient only needing one pair of shoes for trips.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomp

customer_reviews.title: Great product but is a little tight to slip on and off
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially as we were looking for a waterproof yet fully covered shoe for our potty-training toddler who sometimes has accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Aerobu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but not for chubby/chunky feet
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look very well made, strong against wear but too tough to fit my child’s chubby foot in it. I’m not too sure if washing them will loosen the backs or if these were mislabeled wide. However, if your child has normal feet, not chubby or chunky, then buy them. They look great. It’s a shame we can’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa Boan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get on my 2yo, almost give up every time. Gave him a painful blister after running in them. I also bought a pair for my 6yo and she never chooses to wear them. Not practical. I'll stick with crocs or sandals next time I buy.
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: To a wide feet she needs to push some. ...
customer_reviews.text: To a wide feet she needs to push some.... after that is ok! using socks of course!!! /Con pie ancho ella necesita empujar un poco con medias por supuesto pero luego de eso le quedan bien!!!
customer_reviews.author: JoE

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Kids go through shoes so fast, but not these, these LAST!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this pair for my 5yr old and he lives in them, love that they are basically indestructible, and washable! I was buying four or more pairs of tennis shoes a year for this kid, but not any more....these have lasted almost 6 months now and I see him growing out of them before needing another pair....and I will be a repeat customer for the next size!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexus Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Great play shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Bought these shoes for my son who is a hard player. Started out wearing socks,just because some of the other reviewers talked about blisters. So far none, had him wear them about two weeks with socks. He has played in them for weeks and they are easy to clean and he loves them. Sturdy shoes so far i havent seen any wear or tear
customer_reviews.author: DEADMAN1313

customer_reviews.title: Run just a smidge too big
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes, but they're a bit too big for her, despite measuring her and following the size chart. They also tend to rub on the side of her foot. Hoping that she'll grow into them. Until then, she has worn them with socks and has had minor rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Shawesome

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these shoes. They provide great support and clean up easy. I have two issues with these shoes 1- they took a long time to wear in. For the first couple weeks anytime we used them without socks, my daughters feet would be so irritated. She can finally now wear them all day with minimal irritation. 2- they are a bit difficult to get on little wet or sweaty feet without really having to pull on the back of the shoe. The material on the back is almost like a or maybe is a neoprene, the yellow part has cracked and is pealing. Over all I really like the shoes and I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: srblock

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes for active boys
customer_reviews.text: These shoes work great for messy play as they are easily washed and dried and work fine in dry conditions too. I like the design and style, they fit just fine and my son says he’s comfortable wearing them even without socks on
customer_reviews.author: Daria Shulishova

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe will be great for Spring & Summer. They're to be worn without socks, the sides are open. The material is flexible, kinda rubbery-ish & will allow the shoe to be worn in the river, which will protect little mans precious feet. They're well made. Not sure about the fit as I got them big so he can wear them next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, possibly run big
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little girl. My son however needed a size down, he's not quite into a 12 and 12 was way too big. 11 was pwrfect even though he measures 11.5. Quality is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality little shoe, thankfully not too expensive as it only fit for a month or two. Always the problem with little shoes. We’ve had issues with shoes on amazon before but these are very good quality. We will have to try this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie O.

customer_reviews.title: Summer Dream Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son saw these on tv commercial and wanted them very badly. Our local Stride Rite was sold out so i came to Amazon and chose same day shipping! My son was ecstatic that he chose his color at breakfast and they were at our house by dinner! He loves showing everyone his "water shoes" he has worn them all week and no blisters etc. He has been at VBS getting them wet and the local splash park ...its a perfect shoe! No switching from water shoes to sandals to tennis shoes! I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Maynard

customer_reviews.title: The best part is you just run some water them and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. They are her IT shoe for the summer. She enjoys pool time, gardening, dancing, jumpin, and running in them. The best part is you just run some water them and sit them to the side. They dry so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shiikiss

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as those without mesh back.
customer_reviews.text: Last year I bought my son these but it didn’t have the mesh back. He wore them constantly. This year I bought both my kids these with the mesh back because I loved them so much. Both my kids have blisters and since I live in MN, I bought them in April and they can finally wear them but my return window has closed and now I’m stuck with crap shoes they can’t wear and I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so difficult to put on and compresses the tiny feet 😔 there is absolutely no breathing room for feet to move due to the tight design. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: love these as much as my daughter does
customer_reviews.text: love these as much as my daughter does. They run big but that is because they are sized by age. So I know my daughter is on the younger side of the size range and will grown into them. She has no problems getting around in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert R. Valderas

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Comfortable...but wear socks to prevent blisters
customer_reviews.text: As with other comments, wearing these without socks could lead to blisters. I felt the inside with my bare hands and there were just too many rough spots. Also they ran a bit small, so that putting them on without socks proved impossible. But they seem comfortable and with no show socks they still look great. Again...wearing with no socks and subjecting to water seems like a disastrous recipe for blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable, not durable, and a poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: In 4 months of light use these fashionable shoes did not exceed my durability standards and were a poor fit for toddler son. He does not have wide feet or high arches and in 4+ hours of walking in them on a hot summer day without socks, they produced bad blisters at plant of each foot. Although, he does not slip and fall in them when wearing them at local spray ground park, I do not plan to buy this style again.
customer_reviews.author: JaxB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! MACHINE WASHABLE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I’ve bought two pairs. They’re machine washable and super strong. I would buy 2 more pairs if I wasn’t afraid that he would just grow out them so quickly. These are one of the best summer shoes ever for little boys.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Fit is a little narow
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my toddler hates going barefoot at the splash pad and they are also good for playing on the rest 9f the playground equipment if he doesn't feel like getting wet. He doesn't like wearing them without socks on though, I think the seam runs on his foot a bit. But not enough to leave any marks.
customer_reviews.author: Thompsolonian

customer_reviews.title: I love that she (well me) doesnt have to put on ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these!!! She wore them to the lake and into the lake and back home... some sand did get inside the holes but once she sprayed water on them (still on her foot) the sand came out. I love that she (well me) doesnt have to put on and take off shoes for wet and dry ! We get a lot of compliments on the colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Mlslibra85

customer_reviews.title: Durable water shoes that don't melt
customer_reviews.text: These might be the best water shoes we have purchased. Native Brand and Plae have both melted when left in the hot sun. Crocs are also not approved by our preschool because they aren't secure on the foot. These are perfect! They fit my sons wide feet, they are durable, they stay on and they haven't melted!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair- love these
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are awesome shoes for the summer. They work great in the water but look like real shoes so you can wear them out and about too. Run true to size. Made out of rubber/foam material.
customer_reviews.author: Capester

customer_reviews.title: Love these for outdoor play!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are AWESOME!!! Cute and perfect for outdoor play. Love that they can be water friendly too! My 5 year old prefers to wear socks with hers, my 3 year old prefers no socks. They haven’t left any marks on their feet. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M

customer_reviews.title: They didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked great and my daughter was very excited when she saw them. However, she had difficulty putting them on. She is in 2nd grade, FYI. She also said they felt uncomfortable and that was that. I felt the toe and the length was correct. I'm not sure where the discomfort was. She has been asking for a pair of these, so I know she wasn't making it up. I'm sorry these didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: drmgrl

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfy, and great for active toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler loves these shoes! They’re perfect for an active little boy who loves to play in water. We made him wear socks with them the first few times. After that we let him go without socks and haven’t had any trouble. I’ll likely buy him another pair when he outgrows these!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Handmedown and still like new
customer_reviews.text: I used it for both my toddlers , still like new My toddlers loved it , they keep it on for hours never heard a complaint, and never noticed anything off with my babies feet Good quality , good grip, i do recommend it
customer_reviews.author: AYMEN3M

customer_reviews.title: Larger than other size 10 shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a size 10, so I bought a size 10. But the shoe is clearly larger than my son’s other size 10 shoes from Carter. It fits more like a 10.5 size shoe, maybe even closer to an 11. Good shoe. Just odd in terms of size.
customer_reviews.author: Keep It Private

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. My son had them last summer and wore them everywhere. They can be worn with socks or without and they are perfect because they can get completely wet. So easy to clean if they get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D. O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: We buy these shoes nearly every summer because they are durable and awesome for wet/dry activities. Our son has been wearing them the past few weeks - he did get a blister when he chose not to put socks on and wore them all day at school. I like the breathability of the shoe, which helps keep foot odor at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Especially at Disney World where getting wet or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I’ve gotten for my son. These are great! Especially at Disney World where getting wet or playing is splash pad areas is on the agenda. Hear hold up great to the abuse that my 6 year old puts his shoes through and he outgrows them before they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: John Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My son was excited to wear these, but sadly they did not fit. He has slightly wide feet, but based on similar purchases and reviews I thought these would fit, however, they did not. I still gave three stars because they seem like high quality shoes, and the returns process was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Nice summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes and they fit perfectly. The only reason I cannot give them 5 stars is because the gray stripe immediately began to fade and come off after the first "muddy play and washer". Overall nice summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Cute water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect water shoes for my 3 yr old. Wish it was easier for her to put on herself.. The stretchy ankle part is to much for her to put in alone but it does the job to keep stuff out.
customer_reviews.author: M Carlson

customer_reviews.title: The actual shoe is nicely made however it is very very narrow
customer_reviews.text: The actual shoe is nicely made however it is very very narrow. I wouldn't consider my daughter to have a wide foot at all and I never buy wide sizes for her. This shoe is so narrow it should be redesigned. I gave stars for quality sizing length is spot on the wideness was the only issue. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I WANT THESE SHOES IN GROWN UP SIZES!! These are perfect shoes. My son had a blister on his foot and when he wore these it rubbed on it so he wouldn't touch then again. They didn't cause the blister, his CROCS did that, so bummed he won't wear them. My daughter... Won't take them off. I love that I can hose trek down & ive already put them in the washer multiple times. She's been in the creek, pool & yard with them. LOVE THESE SHOES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl423

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Made2Play Baby, Toddler and Little Boys Phibian Water Shoe
product_meta.description:
The made 2 play phibian is a cross between a shoe and a sandal. Quick dry upper, machine washable, secure closure, and rubber on the outsole.

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: FUN KIDS' FOOTWEAR: These colorful kids' shoes feature slip resistant sole and power strap; Designed for play on the land and water with scuff proof technology and durability
DURABLE AND COMFORTABLE CONSTRUCTION: Everyday ventilated water shoes featuring lightweight premium EVA outsole material to assist movement so your kid can safely play by the pool side

CONVENIENT DESIGN: Stylish shoes have hook and loop closure for easy on/off and sewn in tongue and color for a secure fit; Comes with Aegis and Biome lining with antimicrobial treatment to reduce odor
EASY TO CLEAN: These shoes for children are machine washable and can be cleaned with a damp, warm cloth using mild detergent
PERFECT FOR LAND AND SEA: Rock these stylish sandal sneakers in all seasons, just add socks or jump into the pool wearing these to practice those butterfly kicks
